page.title: 08How Winsford Has Changed
page.content: We interviewed Mrs.Moore and Mrs.Roberts.Both work at High Street C.P.School.They have lived in the area for many years.Here are some of the changes they have noticed. Winsford has grown in size and in population.They argue that the provision for entertainment in the town has deteriorated.There used to be two cinemas,two dance halls,an open air swimming pool and many more country walks.Most of the old shops have gone since they used to be down the High Street which has been recently re-developed.Both contend that life was better.Apart from public houses,most entertainment is to be found outside of the town.{Winsford {hospital,}once by the railway station,no longer exists.
